item.title: Delta Range following, Help need
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

So if I am too far away from the opponent, My character doesn’t do anything.
It just stand there till my opponent walks closer. Then it will range, I need a fix for this code. I don’t want that my character ends up next to him while following, it needs to walk the required blocks to shoot.
Here’s my code

if(UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing) {

if(GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 8) == false){
faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn);
followID = AttackingOn2.playerId;
return false;
}

}

If it’s possible I would like magic following too, I’m happy with 1 of them.
Thanks in advance

Read full topic
